landing.hero_subtitle: Build ATS-friendly resumes, practice with AI interviews, and land your dream job faster.
landing.feature_editor_desc: Easily rearrange sections, customize layouts, and choose from professional templates without fighting with formatting.
landing.feature_ai_desc: Never stare at a blank page again. Our AI generates professional summaries and bullet points tailored to your specific job role.
landing.feature_ai_example: "Managed a team" → "Spearheaded a cross-functional team of 10+ engineers to deliver..."
landing.feature_ai_tip: Consider adding metrics to quantify your impact. For example, "increased efficiency by 20%".
landing.feature_interview_desc: Practice makes perfect. Simulate real interviews with our AI coach, get instant feedback on your answers, tone, and pacing.
landing.feature_interview_question: Tell me about a time you had to handle a difficult conflict at work.
landing.feature_interview_answer: In my previous role, I encountered a situation where...
landing.feature_translate_desc: Applying abroad? Instantly translate your resume into any major language while preserving formatting and professional tone.
landing.cta_desc: Join thousands of professionals who have landed their dream jobs with CareerVivid.
landing.feature_portfolio_desc: Instantly generate a stunning, mobile-responsive personal website from your resume. Showcase your projects, skills, and experience with a unique URL.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about CareerVivid.
faq.a1: Yes, CareerVivid offers a free tier that allows you to build and download a professional resume. We also offer premium features for advanced AI capabilities and unlimited downloads.
faq.q2: Can I download my resume as a PDF?
faq.a2: Absolutely! You can download your resume as a high-quality PDF document, ensuring it looks perfect on any device and is compatible with Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).
faq.q3: How does the AI Interview Coach work?
faq.a3: Our AI Interview Coach simulates real interview scenarios. You can practice answering common questions, and the AI provides instant feedback on your delivery, content, and pacing to help you improve.
faq.q4: Can I import my existing resume?
faq.a4: Yes, you can import your existing resume from PDF or Word formats. Our system will automatically parse the content and populate the builder for you.
faq.q5: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.a5: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your Account Settings page. Your premium access will continue until the end of your current billing period.
faq.a6: We take data security very seriously. Your personal information and resumes are encrypted and stored securely. We do not share your data with third parties without your consent.
faq.a7: Yes, we offer a wide variety of professional, ATS-friendly resume templates designed by career experts. You can easily switch between templates with a single click.
faq.a8: Yes, you can create and manage multiple versions of your resume tailored for different job applications.
faq.q9: What languages does the platform support?
faq.a9: CareerVivid supports resume creation and interface translation in over 36 languages, helping you apply for jobs globally.
faq.a10: If you have any other questions or need assistance, you can reach out to our support team using the contact form below or email us at support@careervivid.com.
